title: Joan Sutherland: A Life on the Move
brief_description: This video looks at the life of Joan Sutherland, following her around the world as she fulfils performing and recording engagements. It looks at her recording in the studio, performing in operatic productions, relaxing at home in London and in Switzerland, enjoying a barbecue with her family and playing with her grandchild. Rated: G
